TextView.android:text:
★Unit ★Contents
★Unit 1: ★Review of Programming Concept
●Definition
●Concept of Programming Language
●Flow chart
●Algorithm
●Pseudocode
●New Paradigm of Programming Language
●Difference between Object Oriented and Event Driven Programming
★Unit 2: ★Object Oriented Programming
●Definition
●Features
●Characteristics of OOPs
●Importance of OOPs
●Basic Concept of Java Programming
●Introduction to Java Technologies (J2SE, J2EE, J2ME)
●Java Tools( javac, java, appletviewer, Javadoc, jar, JVM, JRE , JDBC, JDK)
●Variables
●Tokens and Data Types, Operators
●Conditional Statements (if, if else, if if else, switch)
●Concept of Loops (while, do-while and for)
★Unit 3: ★Classes and Objects
●Concept of Class
●Declaring objects
●Methods
●Constructor
●Inheritance
●Methods Overriding
★Unit 4: ★Package and Interface
●Concept of Package
●Create and Import Package
●Sub Package
●Concept Of Interface
●Implement and Apply Interface
★Unit 5: ★I/O and Java Applets
●I/O Stream
●Read and write Console
●Concepts of Applets
●Embedding Applet to HTML File
★Unit 6: ★Visual Programming
●Concept of .NET Framework
●Common Language Runtime(CLR)
●Intermediate Language
●Assemblies, Class Libraries
●Namespace
●Introduction to Visual Studio
●Integrated Development Environment(Menu bar, Toolbar, Explorer, Toolbox properties, Form Designer)
●Methods and Events in visual Programming
★Unit 7: ★Visual Language
●Variables and Data Types
●Constants
●Array
●Control Statements (Conditional and loop Statements)
●Sub and Functions (Passing Variables and Arguments, Returning value from the function).
★Unit 8: ★Object Oriented Programming
●Class and Object
●Properties, methods and Events
●Constructors
●Concept of Inheritance
●User Control and COM Technology
●Accessing the WIN32 from .NET and Interfacing
●Dynamic Link Library (DLL)
●Exception Handling(Try, Catch)
